front.title: SIP GIN MARTINI with Open-plan Local-number Identifier Values for Enterprises (OLIVE)

abstract.t: The Martini Working Group has defined a mechanism for SIP IP-PBX type devices to REGISTER and obtain SIP service for E.164-based Address of Records, using the GIN mechanism [draft-gin]. This document defines a means for open-plan Local-Numbers to be used with Martini-based IP-PBXs.
